item.description:
We hold our monthly business meeting this month at Panera Bread in Needham. Come and hear what the club is planning! The board members who can answer any questions you may have will be here. All members and prospective members are encouraged to attend.

By actively participating in planning upcoming events, the more fun you'll be generating in upcoming weeks & months.

More info on Panera Bread locations
item.how_to_find_us: Generally we try to get the large center table.
item.name: BBTC Business Meeting - This Month Only, One Week Later Due to the Holiday
